name: Tooley
text:
Tooley
Tooley was Dale Cooper's scoutmaster in the Boy Scouts of America.
On April 20, 1968, during an "eating in the wilds" demonstration, Tooley choked on a dandelion, prompting Cooper to perform the Heimlich maneuver on him.
On July 3, Tooley had the scouts line up to see the letter Cooper had received from J. Edgar Hoover.
